CustomField.formula: IF ( Qual_Date__c >= ( Publication__r.Audit_Cycle_Date__c - 365),"1 Year", (IF ( Qual_Date__c >= ( Publication__r.Audit_Cycle_Date__c - 730),"2 Year", (IF ( Qual_Date__c >= ( Publication__r.Audit_Cycle_Date__c - 1095),"3 Year", (IF ( Qual_Date__c >= ( Publication__r.Audit_Cycle_Date__c - 1460),"4 Year", "5 Year")))))))
CustomField.label: BPA Qual Year
